water.
rain water.
river water.
well water.
see water.
a kind of bird.
a number, & tatoch, a numbering.
a hole, a door, a window. From tummochab, tattochab, an opening.
zinochorochen, tatochoróchen, to be set a coughing.
marrow.
snipe.
a splinter.
a calm. From pattok.
jingles, worn by young men.
pimples, like small warts.
full of pimples.
who?
a sea horn.
a lattice, a grating.
an overgrown man.
a Chinese word, meaning Fatherland.
中文: 一個中文單詞，意思是祖國

釋義: tsi. tat. imp. tara, pass. ta-an, tsina, inota-an, the reading of a list. Pata-a, tran. nom. tattûa, the reading aloud; and Maatttata-a, one who reads the roll.
a sort of reed, of which men make arrows.
中文: 一種蘆葦，人們用它們來做箭

釋義: a firefly, as tai-tai.
we, us. But differs from namo.
a sort of flute.
the same sort of flute; very long.
the heart.
the top or upper part of anything.
blindness of one eye, but so that the white can be seen.
中文: 一隻眼睛失明，但可以看到眼白

釋義: tsi. tat. tosasjiena, pas. tosa-sjienen, tsinosasjien, &c. to have the tooth-ache. Tos-asji, the tooth-ache.
tsi. tatsi. tsibarasabasûa, to aim at drectly, as tsimisi.
tsini. tatsi, tsianna, &c. see in Zimianna, to be distrustful.
tsini. tatsi. itsijka, itsijk, initsijk, inoitsijk, to filli p, to make a point thus [.] nom. tattsik, a tittle point. See zimiek, under Tummesik, ditto.
tsini. tatsi. &c. see under in Z.
tsini. tatsi. tsikia, to leer, to leok askance. Patsiek, trans. tatsiki, nom. Ma-atatsiki.
tsi. tats. tsikoa, pass. tsikoan, tsiniko, inotsikoon, to tight a house that hangs over. Patsiko, trans. nom.
tsini. tatsi. tsimisa, tsimisan, tsinimisan, inotsimisan, to take some food, to taste. Paksimi, to cause such to be done.

tsi. tat. tsipisiepa, pass. tsipisiepen, tsimipsiep, inotsitsiepen, to suck (but not the breast) as a finger, tobacco pipe, &c. Patsiptsiep, trans. Tatsiptsiep, a sucking. Ma-atatsip-tsiep, a sucker. Tsiptsiepan, that of which men suck, as a tobacco pipe, &c.
中文: 像在吸手指或菸斗，但不是乳房

釋義: see Zimisakal
see Zimisi, tatsisi, nom.
tsini. tatsi. tsijtsijsa, to cut off the joint of wood or bamboo.
west. Matatsip, mi, ma, weatherly. Patatsip, trans.
tsinumbar, tatumbar, tubarra, tubarren, tsienbar, inotubbarren, to set one's-self down fast, as those do who fear being pushed away. Pûtûbbar, panatûbbar, &c. to cause such to be done.
中文: 像那些害怕被推走的人一樣趕快安頓好自己

釋義: tsinûmboel, tatûmboel, tubboela, tubboelen, tsienboel, inotubboelen, to seek any one. Patubboel, pinatubboel, papatubboel, ipatubboela, ipatubboel, &c. to cause to be sought. Tattubboel, nom. henve kar tattubboel, mau tattubboel.
tsinumcho, tatumcho, tûchoa, let the u be scarcely heard) tuchoan, **enecho, inotuchoon, to bow, Patû-**o, pi. pa. ipatuchoa. to cause to bow.
tsi. tat. tóchoa, the commencement of the north monsoon. Provb. **choa ja masias sai don ja dalij ma*roos ja badda, they use this pro**b, because the young men do not **rry unless in the cold season.
tsi. tat. tikka, &c. (let the u be scarcely heard) to support, to prop up.
pi. pa. ipatukka, &c. to cause support. Tattûkka, nom. a prop.
zinumkach, tatumkach, tuk-**cha, tukkachen, zienkach, inotuk-**chen, to hunt deer by concealing one's-self in the holes, and behind the edges. Patukkach, pinûtukkach, pa*ukkach, &c. to cause to hunt.
中文: 將自己隱藏在洞中和斷崖後面以獵殺鹿

釋義: zinummaam, tatummaam, ta-*, tûmen, zinaam, inotamen, to an-*er. Pûtaam, pinûtaam, papataam, **tama, &c. to cause to answer.

tsinummaap, tatummaap, ta-*tapen, tsinaap, inotapen, to do all kinds of work, either in the house or in the field. Also to attack, to fall upon. **maap, husbandry, &c. passiv. pret. tataap, work, labour. Ma-atataap, a worker, a labourer.
中文: 在室內或野外進行各種工作

釋義: zinummaas, tatummaas, tasutasan, zinasan, inotûsan, to begin, to do anything first, to be follwed by another. Pataas, pi. pa. ipatasa, ipataas, inipataas, to cause to begin, &c.
中文: 開始，首先做任何事，被另一個人追隨

釋義: zinummabba, tatummabba, tabba, tabbaan, zinubba, inotabbaan, to stick. Patabba, pinûtabba, papatabba, ipatabba, &c. to cause to stick.
tsi. tat. imp. tabacha, pass. tabachen, tsinabach, inotabachen, to do anything first; see also matattabach. Patabach, trans. to cause to be done. Tattabach, nom. a commencement.

zinummabbak, tatummabbak, tabakka, tabakken, zinabakkan, inotabakkan, to dance, also the swaggering of those who fight, or who wish to fight. Pûtabbak, pinatabbak, papatabbak, &c. to cause such to be done.
中文: 跳舞，戰鬥或想要戰鬥的人的搖擺

釋義: zinummachal, tatummachal, tachalla, tachallen, zinachal, inotachallen, to remove the earth, as with a hoe, a spade, &c. It is changed into d see dummachol. Padachal, pinûdachal, papadachal, &c. to cause to be dug up.
zinummabbis, tatummabbis, tabbisa, tabbisan, zinabbisan, inotabbisan, to fan. Patabbis, pinatabbis, papatabbis, ipatabbisa, ipatabbis, inipatabbis, inoipatabbis, to cause to fan.
zinummach-il, tatummach-il, tach-illa, tach-illen, to win, to win a bet. Patach-il, pinatach-il, papatach-il, ipatach-illa, ipatach-il, inoipatach-il, to cause such to be done.
tsi. tat. tach-oa. same as pazinado; mautadacj-o, idem patacho, nom. tattacho, interpretation, intercession. Ma-atattacho, an interpreter, an interceder.

zinummachum, tatummachum, tachumma, tachumman, zinachumman, inotachumman, to put on one's hat, to cover one's head. Patachum, pinatachum, papatachum, ipatachumma, &c. to cause the hat to be put on. Tattachum, the thing put on, (namely the hat.) Tummakkum, tsi. tat. imp. takumma, part. takkumman, &c. means all kinds of covering.
tsi. tat. tachossan, tsinachossan, inotachossan, grass, &c. to cut off. Patachos, also chummoschos.
tsinummagcha, tatummagcha, tagcha, tagchaan, zinagcha, ino*agchaan, to chop, to hack to hew. Patatagcha, pi. pa. ipatagcha, inipatagcha, to cause to be chopped.

zinummagcho, tatummagcho, tagcho, to overhang, not to stand upright: It is sometime changed in d, which see. Padagcho, pinadagch*, dagchoa, dagchoon, zinagcho, inodachoon, to cause to overhang: in which case it is ipadagchoa, ipadagcho, &c.

zinummagchoch, tatu*nmagchoch, tagchocha, tagchochen, zinagchoch, inotagchochen, to scoop. Tummagchoch o bigeno, to skim, to scoop off the forth. Patagchoch, ** natagchoch, papatagchoch, ipatagchocha, inipatagchoch, to cause to scoop. Tummagchoch o tono malla, to l*** water with a bucket.

zinummairs, tatummairs, **isa, taisan, zinaisan, inotaisan, to climb up. Tummaies i kittas, to climb up a ladder. Pûtaies, pinûtaies, papa***, ipataisa, ipataies, inipataies, inoip**ies, to cause to climb.

tsi. tat. taiba, to do anything together, or in company. P** &c. to cause such to be done. ** comes aurri a teiba, that is the ** money given when people work together, as if they said, aúrëdda a teiba, so that this noun seems to come from moriedda and tummûiba, to work together. For they say also, Moriëdda o taiba, and Moribal o taibe, to leave offm to cease such working together.

zinummakal,tatummakal, ta kalla, takallan, zinûkallan, inotakal
lan, to put on a woman's head-band. Pûtakal, pinûtakal, papûtûkal, ipatakalla, &c. to cause such to be done. Written dummakal.

zinummakas, fatummakas, takassa, takassan, inotakassan, to stop any one in the road, or to turn him out of the way. Patakas, pinatakas, papûtakas, ipûtakassa, ipatakas, &c.
to cause such to be done.
中文: 阻止任何人上路，或阻止他前進

釋義: zinummakkis, tatummakkis, taksa, taksen, zinaksan, inotaksan, to stick together, and make one. Patakis, pi. pa. ipûtaksa, ipûtakkis, &c. to cause such to be done.

zinummakkoob, tatummûkkoob, takkoba, takkoban, zinakkoban, inotakkoban, to cover, to cover entirely. Tûmmakkoob o macha, to blind the eyes. Parakkoob, pi. pa. ipaipatakkoba, &c. to cause to be covered. Also to cover with a rug.
zinummala, tatummala, talûtûlanm zinala, inotalan, to find, ro welcome. Patala, pinatala, papûtala, ipûtala, &c. to cause such to be done.

zinummalattala, tatnmmalattala, tallattala, tallattalan, zinalattalan, inotallattalan, to pacify, to still, to calm all sorts of emotions. Patalattala. pi*atalattala, papûtalattala, &c. to cause such to be done.
中文: 撫平，直到各種情緒平靜

釋義: zinummalas. tatummalas, talassa, talassen, zinalassen, inotallassen, to tread under foot. Patallas, pinûtallas, papûtallas, ipatallassa, ipatallas, &c. to cause such to be done.
zinummalizi, tatummalizi, talizia, talizian. zinalizian, inotalizian, to dance. Patalizi, pinatalizi, papûtalizi, ipatalizia, &c. to cause to dance. Sometimes the t is changed into d, see dummalizi.

zinummalpon, tatummalpon, talponna, talponnan, zinalponnan, inotalponnan, to betake one's seld any where, or set forward. Also to stir one's self up, and exert one's strength. **talpou, pi. pa. ipûtalponna, ipatalpon, &c. to cause such to be done.
中文: 在任何地方採取行動，或是激發、發揮自己的力量

釋義: zinummallo, tatummallo, talloa, talloon, zinalloon, inotalloon, to allure, to bait. Patallo, pinatallo, papatallo. &c. to cause to allure.
zinummattal, tatummattal, tattallan, zinattal, inotattallan, to trample with feet. Pûtattal, pinatattal, papatattal, ipatattalla, ipatattal, inipa- &c. to cause such to be done.
zinummallumtum, tatummallumtum, inotallumtum, to cover up one's self or another in order to produce perspiration. Patallumtum, pi. pa. ipatallumtumma, &c.
中文: 遮掩自己或他人以產生汗水

釋義: zinummanna, tatummanna, tanna, tanuaan, zinanna, inotannaan, to open. Tanna osja chachab o donoe, open the door of the house. Patanna, pi. pa. ipatanna, &c. to cause to open. Tattannanna o parara, an opening to let ** light, that is, a window.

zinummao, tatummao, taoa, taoan, zinaoan, inotaoan, to sprinkle, as with water, salt thin m*d, &c. but to cover wood, stone, and other thhings that do not spread is magga. Wherewith * itaoon, inoitaoon. Patao, pinatao, papatao, ipatatoa, ipatao, inipatao, &c. to cause such to be done.

zinummammoos, tatummammoos, itammosa, itammoos, initammoos, inoitammoos, to crumble, to shred. Patammoos, pi. pa. ipat*mmosa. ipatammoos. &c. to cause such to be done. Tummammoos, means to stick anything in the mouth.

zinummapacha, tatummapacha, tapacha, tapachanni, and tapachaiyan, zinapachanni and zinapachayan. inotapachanni and inotapachayan, to put on one's breeches. Patapacha, pi. pa. &c. to cause such to be done.
tsi. tat. tapalla, tapallan, tninapal, inotapallan, to stumble in the way. Patapal, trans. nom. tattapal.

zinummapies, tatummapies, tapisa. tapisen. zinapies, inotapisen, to beat with a stick, as people do their their clothes, in order to knock dust or dirt. Patapies, zinatapies, papatapies, &c. to cause such to be done.
中文: 像人們洗衣服一樣用棍子拍打，以打落灰塵

釋義: zinummapitapies, tatummapitapies, inotapitapisen, to beat with many strokes. Patapitapies, pi. pa. &c. to cause such to be done.

tsi. tat. tara, taran, tsirara, inotaran, to choose anything first: as tummar' o mioa, tummar o mammali balach, to choose to cut down a field; to choose a lady. Patara, trans. ta*ara, a choice. Hence karri tatta-a, mau tat-ta-a, to choose one another.
中文: 選擇砍伐一塊田地；選擇一位女士

釋義: zinummarad, tatummarad, taradda, taradden, zinarad, inotaradden, to gather up what another has scattered, as rice thrown over the floor. Patarad, pi. pa. ipataradda, ipatarad, &c. to cause wuch to be done.
中文: 把撒在地板上的東西集合起來，例如散落在地上的米

釋義: tsi. tat. tamaramarra, tamaramarren, tsinaramar, inotaramarren, to be here and there, separated from one another, some here and some there. Pataramar, trans. such a scattering.
中文: 在這裡和那裡，彼此分散，這裡有一些，那裡也有一些

釋義: tsi. tat. taratralla, to wave as grass, plants, and other little things do, &c. differs from lummitallito. Parakal, trans.
中文: 像草，植物和其他小東西一樣舞動

釋義: same as dummarau. Patarau, pi. pa. ipataraua, &c. as Padarau.
same as dummaraudau. Patarautau. pi. pa. same as padaraudau.
tsi. tat. tariesa, to intercept any one in his way. Pataries, trans. Tummariës o azies, to intercept the enemy. Nom. tattariës, an intercepting. Ma-atattaries, a hard runner, who overtakes another.

zinummaroggi, tatummaroggi, taroggia, taroggian. zinaroggian, inotaroggian, to change things which are so much alike that they can be easily mistaken one for the other, and this with intent to deceive. Pataroggi, pinataroggi, papataroggi, ipataroggia, &c. to cause such to be done.
中文: 改變非常相似的事物，以至於人們很容易將它誤認為另一種，有意圖的欺騙

釋義: tsi. tat. taromman, tsinaromman, inotaromman, to betray. Pataromma, trans. tattaromma, treachery. Hence karri-tattaromma, mautattanom-ma. Ma-atattaromma, a traitor.

zinummaroob, tatummaroob, tarroba, tarroban, zinarroban, inotarroban, to cover as people do the head with a fan, to pretect them from sun or rain: thus not entirely covered. Or to cover with a rug or such like in which it differs from tummakkoob. Tatarroob, pi. pa. ipatarroba, &c. to cause to cover.
中文: 用扇子遮蓋住自己，以防日曬雨淋，沒有完全遮蓋住。或用地毯或類似物覆蓋，不同於 tummakkoob

釋義: tsi. tat. imp. tarossa, to pick anything here and there, just as people pluck the ripe ears in a field. Patarros, trans.
zinummassal, tstummassal, *assalla, tassallen, sinassal, inotassal*en, to catch at once, to apprehend. Patassal, pi. pa. ipatassalla, &c. to cause such to be done. Tattasal, nom.

zinummassin, tatummassin, *assina, tassin, zinassin, inotassin, to entertain any one. Patassin, pi. pa. *patassin, inipatassina, inoipatassin, to cause such to be done. Tattassin, *n expectation, hope.
zinummatas, tatummatas, ta*asa, tatasan, zinatas, inotatasan, to fathom. Patatas, pi. pa. ipatatasa, &c. to cause to be fathomed. Tatas, a fathom.
zinummatta, tatummatta, tat-*a, tittan, zinattan, inotattan, to stamp *eed out of the husk. Patatta, pi. pa. patatta, inipatatta, inoipatatta, to cause to be stamped out. Tatta, a *ice stamper.
zinummattam, tatummattam, tattamma, tattammen, zinattam, *notattammen, to hold fast. Patattam, pi. pa. ipatattamma, ipatattam, &c. to cause to hold fast.

zinummau-aab, tatummau-aab, tauba and taûmasan, taûba and *aûmasan, tsinauaban and tsinauma*an, inotaulan and inotaumasan, to do anything first or before another, whether drinking, speaking, or tasting. Patau-aab, pi. pa. ipatauaba, ipatauaab, &c. to cause such to be done, as mananat. Tattau-aab, or tau-aab. nom. subst is used adverbially as before.
中文: 第一個做任何事情，無論是喝酒，說話還是品嚐食物

釋義: zinummauka, tatummauka, tauka, taukan, zinauka, inotaukan, to do anything over again. Patauka, pinatauka, papatauka, ipatauka, inipatauka, inoipatauka, to cause such to be done. Tummaukauka, zi. ta. to increase Tummauka. Pataukauka, &c. as patauka.
same as tummauka. Pataula, same as patauka. Gummalich, idem. nom gagallich: pagallich, idem, mon. gagallich.

zinummaulaula, tatummaulaula, taulaula, zinaulaula, inotaulaulan, to do anything very often; same as Tummaukauka. Pataulaula, pi. pa. &c. as Pataukauka,  to cause anything to be done frequently. Gummalle_allich, idem. Pagallegallich, id.
中文: 經常做某事；使某事經常被完成

釋義: zinummaumasa, tatummaumasa, taumasa, taumasanni and taumasayan, zinaumasanni and zinaumasayan, same as Matinnaam. Pataumasa, pi, pa, ipataumasa, inipûtaumasa, inoipataumasa, same as patinnaam.
zinummauraya, tatummauraya, tauraya, taurayan, zinaurayan, inotaurayan, to put into a fright. Patauraya, pi, pa, ipûtaûraya, inipatauraya, inoipatauraya, to cause to be afraid.
tsinumme, tatumme, tea, teen, tene, inoteen, to angle. Pûte, pinate, papate, ipatea, ipate, inipate, inoipate, to cause thus to fish. Tatte, nom.

tsinûmmea, tatummea, te-a, te-ûan, tene-a, inote-aûn, to punish. Pûtea, pinatea, papûtea, ipûte-û, inipate-a, inoipatea, to cause such to be done. Tattea, nomen, that wherewith people punish, or the punishment itself.
tsi. tat. tsänna, tsean, tsinean, inoteän, same as tûmmaiba. Patsan, trans. Tean, nom.

tsinummear, tatummear, ettear, inetear, inoetear, to draw forth, to drag along. Pûtear, pinatear, papatear, ipatearra, ipatearen, inipatear, inoipatear, to cause to be dragged. Tattear, nom. a drawing forth; this word is also applied to the poles of a cart, between which an ox is fastened, in order to draw it.
tsinummear, tatummear, tearra, tearren, tsinear, inotearren, to support, to prop up. Patear, pinatear, papatear, ipatearra, ipatear, inipatear, inoipatear, to cause such to be done. Tattear, a prop.
zinummeer, tatummeer, tera, terin, zineer, or tineer, inoterin, to avoid, to shun either a stab, or a blow. Pateer, pinateer, papateer, ipatera, ipateer, inipateer, inoteer, to cause to avoid.

zinummenon, tatummenon, tinnona, tinnonnen, zininnon, inotonnonnen, also tinnonnan, zininnonnan, inotinnonnan, to weave. Patinnon, pi, pa, ipatinnonna, ipatinnon, inipatinnon, inoipatinnon, to cause to weave.
zinummepar, tatummepar, teparra, teparran, zineparran, inoteparran, to lean on anything with the hand or arm. Patepar, pinatepar, pa. ipateparra, ipatepar, inipatepar, inoipatepar, to cause to lean.
中文: 用手掌或手臂靠在某物上

釋義: zinummerap, tatummerap, terappa, terappen, zinerap, inoterappen, to lick. Paterap, pinaterap, papaterap, inoipaterap, to cause to lick.

zinummilla, tatummilla, itilla-a, initilla, inoitilla, to set in, to print in, to stick in, as people pierce a deer with a spear; or to imprint, as people press a seal on wax; while the impression is expressed by the pass. pret. of the verb initilla, that is, that which is impressed. It means also to cook food for children. Pûtilla, pinatilla, papûtilla, ipatilla, inipatilla, inoipatilla, to canse an impression to be made.
中文: 刺進（鹿）；標出記號、特徵（如人們把海豹壓在蠟上）

釋義: zinummillak, tatûmmillak, tillaggen, zinillag, inotillaggen, to appear, to seem. Patillak, pinatillak, papûtillak, ipatillagga, ipatillak, inoipatillak, to cause to appear.

zinummillik, tatûmmillik, tillikka, tillikken, zinillik, inotillikken, to be struck with blindness in one eye, so that the white of the eye cannot be seen, for then it is tollassen, from tummollas. Patillik, pinatillik, papatillik, ipatillikka, ipatillik, inipatillik, inoipatillik, to cause such to be done. Tûtillik, such a blinding.
中文: 因單眼盲而讓人留下印象（眼白無法被看到）

釋義: to level the ground for the foundation of a house, and to beat it hard with flat pieces of wood.
中文: 做房屋地基；用一片木頭用力敲打

釋義: zinummittil, tatummittil, tittilla, tittillan, zinittillan, inotittillan, to beat in. Patiltil, pi. pa, ipatiltilla, ipatiltil, &c. to cause such to be done. Tattiltil, a nail or peg which people drive in, also the driving in itself.
tsi: tat: tirtirra, to tremble, Patirtir, transit: tattirtir, nom. a trembling.
zinummis, tatûmmis, itissa, itis, initis, inoitis, to throw away, to lose. Patis, pinatis, papatis, ipûtissa, ipatis, inipatis, inoipatis, to cause to be thrown away. Maatûttis, one who throws away.
zinûmmissan, tatûmmissan, tissanna, to sigh. Patissan, pinatissan, papatissan, ipatissanna, ipatissan, inipatissan, inoipatissan, to cause to sigh. Tatissan, a sigh. Maatattissan, one who sighs.

zinummo-ach, tatûmmo-ach, toacha, toûch-en, zino-ach-an, inotoach-an, to come out, to come to light. Thus the sun and moon are said tûmmo-ach, to rise; grass and vegetables, tûmmo-achibabota, to come above the ground; and men, tûmmoach ta, to come out into the street. Pûtoach, pinatoach, papûtoach, ipatoacha, ipatoach, inipatoach, inoipatoach, to cause such to be done. Tattoach, a rising, a coming up.
zinummo, tatummo, toa, toon, zino, inotoon, to reach out the hand to receive anything. Pato, pinato, papato, ipato, inipato, inoipato, to cause such to be done.

zinum-o, tatum-o, to-a, toûn, zino, inotoan, to pick, to stick. Tumo chirrap, to pick the teeth. Tûm-otaddarries, to put the key in a lock, to lock it up, the locking up itself. Also to gore, as a deer with his horns.
zinummoch, tatummoch, toch-a, tochen, zinoch, inotoch-en, to number. Tummoch o bido, to read. Patoch, pinatoch, papatoch, ipatoch-a, ipatoch, inipatoch, inoipatoch, to cause to be numbered.

zinummochab_, tatummochab, tochûbba, tochbàban, zinochabban, inotochabban, to make a hole. Pûtochab_, pinatochab_, papatochab, ipûtochabb_a, ipatochab_, inipatochab_, inoipatochab, to cause such to be done. Tattochab, the making a hole; tochab, a hole.

zinummod, tatummod, todda; (this passive is used respecting a field. Bonna todden, the field is planted. But itod, initod, inoitod, means the rice &c is sown;) todden, zinod, inotodden, cover the seed with earth when it is sown. Patod, pi, pa, ipûtodda, ipatod, &c. Tatod, the covering of that which is sown after the sowing. Taddodayan, the sowing time or place.
中文: 播種時用土把種子蓋住

釋義: zinummoelakkies, tatummoelakkies, toelakisa, toelakisen, zinoelakies, inotoelakkisen, to do anything unexpectedly; same as Poelakies. Tummoelakkies o poch o cho, to shoot a man suddenly. Tûmmoelakkies, o payach, o riba, to soil a coat unexpectedly. Patoelakkies, pi, pa, ipatoelakisa, ipatoelakies, inipatoelakies, inoipatoelakies, to cause such to be done. Tattoelakies, a mistake, a missing. Hence, kar tattoelakkies, mau tattoelakkies. Mà-atattoelakkies, one who misses.

zinummok, tatummok, tokka, tokken, sinok, inotokken, to overthrow. Tummok o mallo, to upset a cup. Tummok o bato, to knock against a stone, to stumble. Tummok, o don, to knock at a house, or a door. Tummok o tazirrisan, to hit a nail or pin, in order to drive it in. Patok, pi, pa, ipatokka, ipatok, inipatok, inoipatok, to cause such to be done. Tattok, a knocking, also that wherewith we knoch. Tattok a oos, quasitattokaûs, the beat of a drum. Tattoksayan, the place where people beat, also the time when the gong is beaten.
中文: 推翻; 絆倒;  顛倒; 敲門

釋義: tsi, ta tokkóa, tokkoûn, pass. &c. to heat up, to lay in a heap. Patokko, to cause such to done. Tokko, a heap.
zinum: tatum: tókkotokka, tokkotokken, zinokkotok, inotokkotokken, the redoubling of tummok. Patokkotok, pi, pa, ipûtokkotokka, ipatokkotok, &c. the redoubling of patok.

tsinûmmolillis, tatummolillis, (imp. tollalisa,part. tollolissen, tsinullllolis, inottollolissen, nom. tollalis, a spark, a bit of fire,) to give out sparks, as red hot iron does when it is beaten. Patollilis, pi, pa, ipatolollossa., ipûtolillis, inipatolillis, inoipatolillis, to cause to give out sparks.
tsi: tat: tullalla-a, tûllallaan, tsinullalla-an, the blossoming of trees: inotullalallû-an. Patullalla, transitiv. Tallalla, nom. blossom.
tsi, tat, tollassa, tollassen, tsinollûs, inotollassen, to be blind of one eye, but so as that the white can be seen. Patollas, trans. Tattollas, such blindness.
中文: 一隻眼睛瞎掉，但可以看到眼白

釋義: zinummollo, tatummollo, tollóa, tolloan, zinolloan, inotolloan, to set on fire. Tummollo, tatollo, to light a candle. Patóllo, pinatollo, papûtollo, ipatolloa, ipatollo, inipatollo, inoipatollo, to cause to be lighted; nom. tattollo, a candle.
中文: 生火; 點蠟燭; 使發光

釋義: zinummoltol, tatûmmoltol, toltolla, toltollan, zinoltollan, inotoltollan, to smoke with a whisp of straw, called tattoltol, in order to drive away the moschettoes. Patoltol, pinûtoltol, papûtoltol, ipatoltolla, ipatoltol, inipatoltol, to cause such to be done.
tsi: tat: tonnoga, tomnogan, tsinonog, innotonnogan, the first rising of the water in the sea or rivers, Tmmonok sai o to, de abas, desabba. Tattonnog, nom. the commencement of flood tide.
中文: 海或河第一次水位上升

釋義: zinummoob, tattûmmoob, itòbo, itoob, initoob, inoitoob, to sprinkle water, also to sprinkle with the same, when it is toba, tóban, zinoban, inotoban. Patoob, pinatoob, papûtoob, ipûtoba, ipatoob, inipatoob, inoipatoob, to cause to be sprinkled.
zinummo-ol, tatûmmo-ol, toolla, to-ollan, zino-ollan, inoto-ollon, same as tummollo. Pato-ol, pi, pa, ipato-olla, ipato-ol, &c. same as Patollo.

ziniummoos, tattummoos, tosa, tosan, zinosan, inotósan, where with? itoos, initoos, inoitoos, to rub. Patoos, pinatoos, papatoos, ipûtosa, ipatoos, intipatoos, inoipatoos, to cause to be rubbed. Tûmmóostoos, intend.

zinummorraich, tattummorraich, torraicha, torraichen, zinorraich, inotorraichen, to slide, or slip of, to slide out. Pûtorraich, pi, pa, ipatorraicha, ipatorraich, inipatorraich, inoipatorraich, to cause such to be done.
zinummorrik, tatummorrik, torrika, torriken, zinorrik, inotorriken, to tell lies. Pûtorrik, pinatorrik, papatorrik, ipatorrikka, ipatorrik, inipatorrik, inoipatorrik, to cause to lie.

tsi: tat: torritorria, torritorrian, tsinotorritorri, inotorritorrian, to flicker, to glitter as the fire flies in the dark, also as the stars in the night. Tummaitas, idem. Pataitas, idem. Patorritorri, trans. Torritorri, nom. a glittering, also a fire fly. Taitai, idem.
中文: 閃爍；像螢火蟲在黑暗中一樣發光

釋義: zinummorritorrik, tatummerritorrik, torritorrikka, torritorrikken, zinorritorrik, inotorritorrikken, idem. Patorritorrik, an increase of tûmmorrik.

zinummorro, tatummorro, torroan, zinorroan, inotorroan, to leak, to leak out, either through roofs or through broken vessels and so forth. Patorro, pinatorro, papatorro, ipatorroa, ipatorro, inipatorro, inoipatorro, &c. Tummorrotorro, intend.
中文: 漏；從屋頂、毀壞船隻等漏出

釋義: tsi: tat: torrocha, torrochen, tsinorroch, inotorrochen, to drag, to pull after one, neutr. Patorroch, trans. to draw, activ. to cause to be drawn. Tattorroch, nom. a dragging. Tummorrotorroch, intend.

zinummorrod, tatummorrod, torroda, torrodan, zinorrodan, inotorrodan, to look downwards, to look in a glass. Pûtorrod, pi, pa, ipatorrodda, ipûtorrod, inipûtorrod, inoipatorrod, to cause such to be done. Tummorrotorrod, intend.

zinummose, tatummose, toséa, tosein, zinose, inotosein, same as tummorrik; patose, pinatose, papatose, ipatosea, ipûtose, inipatose, inoipatose, same as patorrik. Tummosetose and
patosetose, same as tummorritorrik and patorritorrik.
tsi: tat: toshieka, pass. to shiekan, &c. to spatter, to bedaub. Patoshiek, trans. Tattoshiek, nom.
zinummosik, tatummosik, tosikka, tosikken, zinòsik, inotosikken, same as tummorrik. Patossik, same as patorrik. Tummositosik, and patositosik, same as tummorritorrik and patorritorrik.
tsi: tat: tôtta, to let wind. Patot, to cause such to done. Tottat, foul wind.

zinummotto, tatummotto, tottoa, tottoon zinótto, inotottoon, to forge, to beat any thing to powder. Patotto, pinatotto, papatotto, ipaitottoa, ipatotto, inipatotto, inoipatotto, to cause such to be done.
tsi: tat: tottoa, tottoòn, tsinotto, inotottoon, the budding, or shooting forth of the fruit after the blossoms fall off.
中文: 發芽；果實在花落後發芽

釋義: zinumpa, tatumpa, tuppa, tuppûan, zienpa, inotuppaan, to think, to reflect. Patuppa, pi, pa, ipatuppa, inipatuppa, inoipatuppa, to cause to to think. Tumpatuppa, intend. Tattuppa, thoughts. Maatattuppa, one who thinks.

zinumpas, tattumpas, tuppasa, tuppasen, zienpas, inotuppasin, to tread with the foot on one side. Patuppas, pinatuppas, papatuppas, ipatuppasa, ipatuppas, inipatuppas, inoipatuppas, to cause such to be done. Tattuppus, nom. Tumpatuppas, indicative tumpas.
zinumpies, tatumpies, tuppisa, tuppisen, zinupies, inotuppisen, same as tummagga. Patuppies, pi, pa, ipûtuppisa, ipatuppies, same as pataga.

zinumpoch, tattumpoch, ituppocha, ituppoch, inituppoch, inoituppoch, to fix in the ear rings: where to? tuppocha, tuppochan, zienpochan, inotuppochan. Patuppoch, pi, pa, ipatuppocha, ipatuppoch, inipatuppoch, inoipatuppoch, to cause such to be done. Tattuppock, ear-rings.
tsi, ta, tupporra, tupporren, tsienpor, inotupporren, the hatching of birds. Pûtûppor, transiti. tatuppor, nom. a hatching.
zinumpuk, tattumpuk, tuppukka, tuppukken, zienpuk, inotuppuken, to count, to reckon up any thing in the mind. Patuppuk, pinatuppuk, pa. ipatuppukka, ipatuppuk, &c.

zinumrach, tattumrach, tirracha, tirrachen, zinirrach, inotirrachen, the bursting of water through a dam. The escaping of a fish through a hole or rent in the net. The running out of paddy or such like article through a sack: the place where it leaks is tirrachan, zinirrachan, ino. &c. Patirrach, pi, pa, ipatirracha. &c.
tsinumsar, tattumsar, tsarren, tsiensar, inotsarren, to shine, to illumine. Pasar, pinazar, papazar, ipûzarra, ipazar, inipazar, inoipazar, to cause to shine. Tatsar, nom. appearance.
tsi: ta: tsarra, to stick, to stab. Tumsar o binnan, to stab a deer with a spear.
tsi: tat: tsika, tsiken, tsinick, inotsiken, to stain, to spot. Patsik, transit. Tatsik, a spot.

zinumtum, tattumtum, tumtumma, tumtummen, zinumtam, inotumtummen, to fast, to deny the stomach its food. Patumtum, pinatumtum, papatumtum, ipatumtumma, ipatumtum, inipatumtum, inoipatumtnm, to cause such to be done.
tsinumso, tatumso, tsoa, tsoan, tsiensoan, inotsoan, to assent by a nod. Patso, pinatso, papatso, ipatsoa, ipatso, inipatso, inoipatso, to cause such to be done. Tatso, a nod.
between: tuppach o don, between the houses: tuppach o ranna, amongst the hills. The verb neuter is matuppach, to be between two, and the active, Patuppach, from the root tuppach.
the stalk wherewith the fruit is fastened to the tree or plant.
中文: 把果實聯繫在樹或植物上的莖

釋義: a troop of men or beasts, a generation, a principal reason.
the hair on the skin of men or beasts, excepting the hair of the head, beard, or eye-brows. it is written dûppoch.
中文: 人或野獸皮膚上的毛，但不指頭髮、鬍子和眉毛

釋義: sugar. Tuppoos o bato, sugar candy.
a fire-fly same as Taitai. The verb Maturriturri. Mataitai.
中文: 螢火蟲，和 Taitai 相同

釋義: inummachol, aummachol, achòlla, achollen, inachol, inoachòllan, to lay any thing out of the way. Pûachol, pinûachol, papûachol, ipûacholla, ipûachol, inipaachol, inoipaachol, to cause to be laid aside.

inûmmadach, aûmmadach, adacha, adachen, inadachan, inoadachan,: what? iadach, iniadach, inoiadach, to hang up. Ummadach o tairien, to hang up beads; ummaadach o ballasau, to hang up a sword. Paadach, pinaadach, papaadach, ipaadach, inipaadach, inoipaadach, to do so to another, to cause to be done.

inummadok, aummadok, adokka, adokken, inadok, inoadokken, to pick and choose. Elli ohinûmmar o baûsje tapos ja assaban: inummadokchono kinummossi: the Dutch have not burnt down the whole village : they have picked out the disobedient. Paadok, pi, pa, ipûadokka, ipaadok. &c. to cause such to be done.
inummado, aummado, addoa, addoan, inaddoan, inoaddoan, to dissuade. Paadde, pinaaddo, pa. ipaaddoa, ipaaddo, inipaaddo, inoipaaddo, to cause to dissuade. Ummoossó, idem.

inummalappo, aummalappo, alappoa, alappoon, inalappo, inoalappoon, from which are derived alappoan, inalappoan, inoalappoon, to heave up, to lift up. Paalappo, pinaalappo, papaalappo, ipaalappoa, ipaalappo, inipaalappo, inoipaalappo, to cause to lift up.
inum: aum: aoa, aoon, inao, inoaoon, the melting of salt: trans. pa-ao, melted salt, brine: ao-no-soa, brine for washing wounds.

inummapar, aummapar, aparra, aparren, inapar, inoaparren (that out of which it is taken) aparran, inaparran, inoaparran, to take any thing out with the hand or fingers pinched close together. Ummapar o inochan, inai mallo: to take, food out of a dish. Ummapar o dassono, innai roboen, to take rice out of a bag. Ummapar o boono innai kallaman, to take out of a large pot, &c. Paapar, pi, pa, ipaaparra, ipaapar, inipaapar, inoipaapar, to cause such to be doue.
中文: 用雙手捏掐在一起的方式把東西拿出來

釋義: inummapach, aummapach, apacha, apachan, inapachan, inoapachan, to climb, to climb up. Paapach, pinaapach, papaapach, ipaapacha, ipaapach, inipaapach, inoipaapach, to cause to climb.

inummarras, aummarras, arrassa, arrasan, inarrasan, inoarrassan, to stride, to step over, to pass by. Paarras, pinaarras, papaarras, ipaarasa, ipaarras, inipaaras, inoipaarras, to cause such to be done.
inummaron, aummaron, aronna, aronnen, inaron, inoaronnen, to roll up. Paaron, pinaaron, papaaron, ipaaronna, ipaaron, inipaaron, inoipaaron, to cause to roll up. NB. The r is sometimes doubled.
inummatat, aummatat, atatta, atatten, inatat, inoatatten, to chew. Paatat, pinaatat, papaatat, ipaatatta, inipaatat, inoipaat, to cause to chew.

inummillag, aummillag, illagga, illaggen, inillag, inoillaggen, to unfold, to open out. Ummelag o naupoot, o bido, to unfold a cloth or a book. Paillag, pinaillag, papaillag, ipaelagga, ipaelag, inipaelag, inoipaelag, to cause such to be done.

inummelis, aumelis, olissa, olissoan, inolissan, ino-olissan, to take off the lid, or cover. Ummelis o babchab, to open the lid of a pot. Paolis, pinaolis, paaolis, ipaolissa, ipaolis, inipaolis, inoipaolis, to cause such to be done.

inummenig, aummenig, enigga, eniggan, inoeniggan, inoeniggan, to speak gently, as one ashamed or abashed. Paenig, pinaenig, papaenig, ipaenigga, ipaenig, inipaenig, inoipaenig, to cause such to be done.
中文: 當被羞辱後談吐溫和有禮

釋義: inum: aum: illoiloa, illoilan, inilloilo, inoilloiloon, to continue to desire any thing long and earnestly. Pailloilo, nom. illoilo.

inummillc, aummillo, illoa, illoan, inilloan. inoilloan, the winding up of a child in swaddling clothes; also to speak behind one's back, either good or ill. Paillo, pinaillo, papaillo, ipailloa, ipaillo, inipaillo, inoipaillo, to cause such to be done,
中文: 強褓中孩子蜷曲；在人背後說好話或壞話

釋義: inummerap, aummerap, erappa, erappan, inerap, inoerappan, same as Tummerap, to lick. Paerap, pi. pa. ipaerappa, ipaerap, inipaerap, inoipaerap, to cause such to be done.
inummichich, aummichich, ichicha, ichichen, inichich, inoichich, to gnaw. Paichich, pinaichich, papaichich, paichicha, ipaichich, inipaichich, inoipaichich, to cause such to be done.

inumietiet, aumietiet, ietita, ietiten, inietiet, inoietiten, to bite off the ends, as of thread, &c. Paietiet, pinaietiet, papaietiet, ipaietita, ipaietiet, inipaietiet, inoipaietiet, to cause such to be done.
inummior, aummior, iorra, iórran, iniorran, inoiorran, to follow, also to agree to. Ummior o ranied o atite, to obey. Payor, pinayor, papayor, ipayorra, ipayor, inipayor, to cause to follow.
inummitto, aummitto, ittoa, ittoan, inittoan, inoittoan, to sing in solo, to sing before any one. Paitto, pi. pa. ipaittoa, ipaitto, inipaitto, inoipaitto, to cause to sing.

inummitip, aummitip, itippa, itippen, or itippaan, initippaan, inoitippen, or inoitippaan, to cut through, to cut off. Paitip, pinaitip, papaitip, ipaitippa, ipaitip, inipaitip, inoipaitip, to cause to be cut off.
inum : aum: ituppa, the sharpness of strong drink.
to transplant a tree or plant, and for that purpose to dig it up. Paoal, to cause such to be done.
中文: 為了轉植樹或植物把樹挖起來

釋義: to weed, to root weeds out of a field. Pao-o, transiti.
中文: 除草；把雜草從田裡拔起來

釋義: inummoob, aummoob, oppa, óppen, inoob, ino-oppen, to carry out, to bring to an end, to finish. Paoob, pinaoob, papaoob, ipaoba, ipaoob, inipaoob, inoipaoob, to cause such to be done. Aoob, nom.
inummomo, aummomo, omoa, omoan, ino-omoan, to put on a female head-dress. Paono, pinaono, papaono, ipaonoa, ipaono, inipaono, inoipaono, to cause such to be done. Aomo, nom.
inummoror, aumoror, ororra, ororren, inoror, ino-ororren, to fry out fat. Paoror, pi, pa, ipaororra, ipaoror, inipaoror, inoipaoror, to cause to fry out. Aoror, nom.
to halt, to limp, inummatul, aummotul, otulla, otullen, inotul, inootullen. Paotul, transit.
inumpo, aumpo, uppoa, uppoon, ieupo, inouppoon, to knead with the foot. Pauppo, pinauppo, papauppo, ipauppoa, ipauppo, inipauppo, inoipauppo, to cause such to be done.
native cakes of ground rice, bread.
中文: 用米粉和麵包做的本土蛋糕

釋義: the south. Mat a wannan, mi, ma, southward. Patawannan trans.
ten: written tschien.
fish: written tsi.
a needle: written tsia.

the half or side of any thing; hence people say, zhabûan-anig and ûllûmas, the left and right side. An opposite party, written shabaan, verb. Mashabaan, pashabaan. It is also used as a preposition, against.
grief, from Mazichil.
the breast, milk. From Zinido.
the soul: written tsjes.
small worms generated in food;
食物裡產生的小蟲
length, height. From matsilo:writtentsilo.
a spot or stam. From tsimilak.
a silkworm; silk, either woven or raw.
a flea.

zinimianna, tazimianna, zianna, ziannanni, ziniannanni, inoziannanni, to be suspicious, to do any thing from mistrust. Pazianna, pinazianna, papazianna, ipazianna, inipazianna, inoipazianna, to cause such to be done. Written tsimianna, see in T.
中文: 懷疑；出自不信任地做某事

釋義: zinimichallo, tazimichallo, zichalloa, zichalloon, zinichûllo, inozichalloon, to skin off the clear portion from the top, so that the dregs underneath be not disturbed. Pûzichallo, pi, pa, ipazichûlloa, ipazichallo, inipazichallo, inoipazichallo, to cause such to be done.
中文: 從上方把乾淨的部分去皮，以讓下面的渣滓不會被攪亂

釋義: zinimichier, tazimichier, zichirra, zichirran, zinichirran, inozichirran, to resemble, to imitate. Pazichier, pi, pa, ipazichirra, ipazichier, inipazichier, inoipazichier, to make any thing like. Written tsinichier, see in T. Pataitach, idem; tatschier, nom. likeness.

zinimichzich, tazimichaich, zichzicha, zichzichen, zinichzich, inozichzichen, to smooth any thing that is folded or rumpled. Pazichzich, pi, pa, ipazichzicha, ipazichzich, inipazichzich, inoipazichzich, to cause to be smoothed.
中文: 把皺的、蓋起來的東西弄平滑

釋義: zinimido, tazimido, zidoa, zidoan, zinidoan, inozidoan, the sucking of infants. Pazdido, pinazdido, papazdido, ipazdidoa, ipazdido, inipazdido, inoipazdido, to give suck. Tummis o zinido, to wean : shiem initis o zinidó, a weaned child.

zinimiek, tazimiek, izika, iziek, iniziek, inoiziek, to fillip, to give a fillip: to dip as meat in the sauce. Paziek, pinaziek, papaziek, ipazika, ipaziek, inipaziek, inoipaziek, to cause such to be done. Written tsinyk, nom. tatsyk, see in T.
zinimiesto, inozimiesto, ziestoa, ziestoan, ziniesto, inoziestoan, same tumpa. Paziesto, pi, pa, same pûtûppa.

zinimigoggo, tazimigoggo, zigoggoa, zigoggoan, zinigoggoan, inozigoggoan, to stand on tip toe. Pazigoggo, pinazigoggo, papazigoggo, ipazigoggoa, ipazigoggo, inipazigoggo, inoipazigoggo, to cause such to be done.

zinimikak, tazimikak, zikakka, zikakkan, zinikak, inozikakkan, to open; as zikak o ranied, &c. Pazikak, pi, pa, ipazikakka, ipazikak, inipazikak, inoipazikak, to cause to be opened. Said of the mouth and ear. Written tsimikak, see in T.

zinimilak, tazimilak, zilûkka, zilakkan, and zinilakkan, inozilakkan, to befoul. Pazilak, pinazilak, papazilak, ipazilakka, ipazilak, inipazilak, inoipazilak, to cause such to be done. Written tsimilak, see in T. Nomen Zilab, under tsilak.

zinimimis, tazimimies, zimisa, zimisan, zinimisan, inozimisan, to taste. Pazimies, pinazimies, papazimies, ipazimisa, ipûzimies, inipazimies, inoipazimies, ta cause to taste. Written tsimimis, see in T.
zinimioch, tazimioch, ziocha, ziochen, zinioch, inoziochen, to couple. Pazioch, pinazioch, papazioch, ipaziocha, ipazioch, inipazioch, inoipazioch, to cause such to be done.
zinimipies, tazimipies, zipisa, zipisen, zinipies, inozipisen, to cut. Pazipies, pi, pa, ipazipisa, ipazipies, inipazipies, inoipazipisen, to cause to cut. Written tsimipies, see in T.

zinimipó-o, zipo-oa, zipóan, zinipòan, inozipòan, to fall on one's knees. Pazipo-o, pinazipo-o, papûzipo-o, ipaeipo-oa, ipazipo o, inipazipo-o, inoipûzpo-o, to cause such to be done. Written tsimipo-o.
zinimipoespoes, tazimipoespoes, zipoespoessa, zipoespoessen, zinipoespoes, inozipoespoessen, to pick out crumbs or filaments, Pazipoespoes, &c, to cause such to be done.

zinimipok, tazimipok, zipoka, zipokan, zinipokan, inozipokan, to paint, to write. Pazipok, pinazipok, papazipok, ipazipoka, ipazipok, inipûzipok, inopûzipok, to cause such to be done. Written tsimipok, see in T. Nom. tatsipok, a writing, also the instrument employed. Tatsipokan, and tatsipókayan, a writing place or table.

zinimiries, tazimiries, zirisa, iziries, iniziries, inoiziries, whereto ? zirisan, zinirisan, inozirisan, to hang any thing up. Pûziries, pinaziries, papaziries, ipûzirisa, ipaziries, inipaziries, inoipaziries, to cause such to be done. Written tsimiries, see in T. Tatsiries, a hanging up: tatsiriesan, and tatsiriesayan, the place whereto, as a hook &c.
zinimiro, tazimiro, ziroa, ziroon, ziniro, inoziniroon, to reach. Paziro, pinaziro, papaziro, ipaziroa, ipaziro, inipaziro, inoipaziro, to cause to reach.

zinimirrit, tazimirrit, zjirta, zjirtan, zimirtan, inozjirtan, to hold or lead by a string. Pazjirrit, pinazjirrit, papazjirrit, ipazjirta, ipazjirrit, inipazjirrit, inipazjirrit, to cause such to be done. Written tsimirrit. Nom. tatsjirt, that wherewith we lead, as a string.

zinimisakal, tazimisakal, zisakalla, zisakallan, sinisakallan, inozisakûllan, to squat down. Pazisakal, pinûzisakal, pa. ipûzisakalla, ipûzisakal, inipûzisakal, inoipûzisakal, to cause such to be done. Written tsimisakal, see in T.

zinimisi, tazimisi, zisia, zisian, zinisian, inozisian, that which ? zisien, zinisi, inozisien, to leer through a hole, to aim, or look directly. Pazisi, pinazisi, papûzisi, ipûzisia, ipûzisi, inipûzisi, inoipazisi, to cause such to be dene. Written tsimisi, see in T.
中文: 透過洞斜瞅；設目標；直直看過去

釋義: zinimisella, tazimisellasella, zellasella, zellasellaan, zinellasellaan, inosellasellaan, to do any thing over again, in order to be sure.
中文: 為了確認而把事情再做一遍

the heel. Ziò no chûrrina, a small piece of skin under the ears.
a chicken of the wild
家養雞
west. Zipûn a amisûn, northwest. Written tsipûn, see in T. Zipûn a wannan, south-west.
the sun, a day.
a little dog.
a branch: used only of small twigs.
a band on which to hang a gun; a sash.
as tattaisan, a step, stairs.

or modaraudau ya idas, full moon

new, young

wood, a stock, a tree, a bush. Baron ieliel, a mulberry tree. Baron o bilpil, a plantain tree. Baron o roggo, a cocoanut tree. Baron o ?bi, an areca tree. Baron o amo, a plum, or peach tree. Baron o amo ranna, a cherry tree. Baron o ariem, a lemon or citron tree
中文: 木頭; 存貨; 樹; 灌木叢

釋義: a certain tree, bearing blue flowers like the lilac. Alabos aras, same, satik, the leaves are used for a wounded or sprained limb. Maran, an older tree. Dallolees, nearly like the birch tree.
中文: 一種如紫丁香有著藍色花朵的樹

釋義: the wind. Bar-bar, the south wind. Bar-bayan, the east wind. Bar-tsipan, the west wind. Mas-oan, the north wind. Barbayan a wannan, the south east wind. Barri tabo-ol, the north east wind. Bar-tsipan a amisau, the north west wind.
naked
superfluous
natural spots on the body. Borrah, large spots; also drinking spots on the clothes

an onion
a binding of bamboos, tatkach, a binding for the hunt: choa, a small binding of rattan. Batbat tsiaas,a short bandage. Batbat tasso, a bandage one fathom long

a grindstone
millet
pot herbs, vegetables

mallows. Robarroboûlaloas, nearly like the mallow, with a prickly seed. Sishien o ranna, argentaria. Babinnik,wild marjorum. Sarolad, perhaps basil, or balm. Babiûr, bugle. Dirró,sage. Auwyt, wormwood. Togea, marjorum. Tarraras, purslain. arraisän, wild chervil. Tallili, sorrel. Oe, mead. Baziep o poot, the mustard plant. Rasan, leaves of the violet. Tallal o rasûn, the violet. Tari-mûsoan, a lily. Arosat and dalobe, sweet-sumelling plants. Daien a ta, bata, atomo. Rool o babo, thistles. Ool, hemp.
the hide, the skin of a beast. Bazij o malam, a shield.
devil's bread, toad stools
mouldy
the milt of a pig

a dove
the leaf of a tree or plant. Bionot, the two elevated leaves on the side of the rose. Biorool, the buttocks. Challam, the leaf of a book: challam o baritok, a sheet of paper
lampblack, ink, paper with writing on it, black paint

scabby

a deer, whether buck or doe. Masorro, a roe. Sinni o binnan, a hind. Bag o basan, a full grown buck. Bao binnan, a young deer, one year old or thereabouts. Chaddoa, a young deer, with small horns. Masham, an old buck
soup, that has something cooked in it
thunder
the paunch
an arrow. Roddok tallapiech large arrows. Borro, a hard reed of which arrows are made.

it is done! said when anything is broken or cut in two. Bossot, it is out! said when anything is drawn out! also chos, cho-oós, when it has been drawn out long. Giech, said when anything is torn. Boch-ies, it is in pieces! said when anything falls to pieces. Bottok, it is advised. Goch, it is in. Bottok, it cracks

the seed of a fruit, the flesh of beasts, or fishes

fish. Tsi ballai, all sorts of small fish, catfish. Tsisàbbi, carp. I'si meried, eels. Tsi maarrát, shellfish. Tsi rodo, cod. Tsi tarra boetsina, a roach: tsi tarra pagaoûbaas, a sword fish. Tsi taiáûs, a sand-creeper. Tsi rócot, a smelt. Tsi teen, a fish, that has scales like the carp, but smaller. Tsi kabea, almost like the teen, but smaller. Tsi taddai, a sole. Tsi taddadach, a Chinese fish, full of bones. Tsi tillabis, a bream. Tai paûsosan, a broad fish with a sharp nose, transparent and soft. Tsi abaas, a shark. Tsi oàr, almost like a shellfish. Tsi o bioog, a kind of sprat
